hovercards/error-scratchdb-deleted: The post has been deleted. (at least in ScratchDB)
hovercards/error-no-project: The project couldn't be found or is private.
hovercards/error-no-user: The user couldn't be found or is private.
hovercards/info-views: {count, plural, 0 {No views} one {1 view} other {# views}}
hovercards/info-loves: {count, plural, 0 {No loves} one {1 love} other {# loves}}
hovercards/info-favorites: {count, plural, 0 {No favorites} one {1 favorite} other {# favorites}}
hovercards/info-remixes: {count, plural, 0 {No remixes} one {1 remix} other {# remixes}}
hovercards/info-followers: {count, plural, 0 {No followers} one {1 follower} other {# followers}}
hovercards/info-following: {count, plural, 0 {No following} one {1 following} other {# followers}}
hovercards/info-projects: {count, plural, 0 {No projects} one {1 project} other {# projects}}
hovercards/info-comments: {count, plural, 0 {No comments} one {1 comment} other {# comments}}
hovercards/info-managers: {count, plural, 0 {No managers} one {1 manager} other {# managers}}
